price: 46. Di: “¡Oh, Al-lah, Creador de los cielos y de la tierra, Conocedor del gaib[874] y de lo manifiesto!, Tú juzgarás a Tus siervos sobre lo que discrepaban”.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَٰلِمَ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَ عِبَادِكَ فِي مَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ
footnotes: [874]  Ver la nota de la aleya 3 de la sura 2.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahuma fāṭira al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ʿālima al-ghaybi wal-shahādati anta taḥkumu bayna ʿibādika fī mā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūna
